title: 3rd party app's "Drinking Water" reminder triggers ALARM ICON in status bar & Adaptive Charging too.
content:
I have "Drinking Water" reminder in a 3rd party app & It triggers ALARM ICON in status bar like an Alarm has been set.

And when put on Charging,It also triggers Adaptive Charging despite No ALARM being set & even when Adaptive Charging is turned off.
